I wanted to see really how fast and good is the API for the package for that reason I decide to repeat the project #3 of my basic "Business Intelligence" class. That project took me at least 16 hours to complete, of course that includes the creation of the report but I remember to spend from 5 to 6 hours on SAS doing the data mining. The data is about the customers of a catalog, the objective is to predict which customers are more likely to respond to the catalog campaign and send a catalog to those customers. There is...
